LanguageData.VME_PawnMustBeBestMelee: {0} не является лучшим бойцом ближнего боя в поселении!
LanguageData.VME_RitualTargetDivineTheStarsInfo: Место для ночного ритуала не под крышей. Необходимо убрать крышу хотя бы в 25 клетках от зоны.
LanguageData.VME_CantStartWickerManRitual: Необходим заключённый для сожжения плетёного человека.
LanguageData.VME_NeedsAdults: Вдохновитель и участники должны быть совершеннолетними.
LanguageData.VME_AbilityNeedsATurret: This ability needs to target a turret or mechanoid.
LanguageData.VME_AbilityNeedsInsect: This ability needs to target a wild or hostile insectoid.
LanguageData.VME_AbilityNeedsRoof: This ability needs to target an empty spot under mountain roof.
LanguageData.VME_AbilityNeedsSpotEmpty: This ability needs to target an empty spot.
LanguageData.VME_AbilityNeedsMeal: This ability needs to target food categorized as a meal.
LanguageData.VME_AbilityCaravanWillArrive: A trader caravan has been attracted to your settlement and will arrive in approximately a day.
LanguageData.VME_AbilityAlreadyADessert: Meal is already a dessert. This ability needs to target a meal that isn't a dessert.
LanguageData.VME_AbilityNeedsAColonist: This ability needs to target a free colonist.
LanguageData.VME_AbilityNeedsCorpse: This ability needs to target a fresh humanoid corpse.
LanguageData.VME_DeconstructBuildingDesc: Uninstall junk building to be able to move and reintall it. These can be caravaned out of a map, making "junk expeditions" possible
LanguageData.VME_NeedsWater: Must be built on passable water.
LanguageData.VME_NeedsDistance: Fish traps must be built at least 10 tiles apart from each other.
LanguageData.VME_SmallFishTrapDescriptionInspect: This fish trap can catch small fish:
LanguageData.VME_MediumFishTrapDescriptionInspect: This fish trap can catch medium fish:
LanguageData.VME_LargeFishTrapDescriptionInspect: This fish trap can catch large fish:
LanguageData.VME_PawnMustBeAnAdult: Only adults can participate in this ritual
LanguageData.VME_MaintenanceNeeded: Maintenance needed. If it reaches 0% the nest will be destroyed.
LanguageData.VME_NotTheQueen: The Queen snorts at you: "No, I don't think I will"
LanguageData.VME_NoValidPartySpot: Could not find any valid party spot or organizer was unavailable.
LanguageData.VME_CantStartRitualNoConvertee: You need a reasonably healthy prisoner to start the ritual
LanguageData.VME_ViolentOutcome: Unfortunately, {0} refused to see our reasonable ways and was sacrificed.
LanguageData.VME_NonViolentOutcome: {0} saw our reasonable ways and was converted to our ideoligion.
LanguageData.VME_RitualNeedsNightOrDarkness: Ritual needs to be done at night, or under any condition that lowers light below 50% globally (eclipses don't count).
LanguageData.VME_RitualNeedsClearWeather: Ritual needs to be done at night, and with clear weather.
LanguageData.VEM_HighCorruptionDesc: These people have a too high corruption need (more than 90%). If they reach 100% corruption they will get an extreme level mental break:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.VEM_LowCorruptionDesc: These people have a too low corruption need (less than 10%). If they reach 0% corruption they will be easily swayed to a different ideoligion. Build obelisks to maintain their corruption need or perform Incantation rituals to increase it by 10%:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.VME_MemeAmountTooltip: Максимум доступных черт. Влияет только на идеолигию игрока.
LanguageData.VME_RitualAmount: Максимум доступных ритуалов, не связанных с чертами (по умолчанию 6, требуется перезагрузка)
LanguageData.VME_RitualAmountTooltip: Максимум доступных ритуалов, не связанных с чертами. Ритуалы, принудительно добавленные чертами ОБЫЧНО не должны считаться, но бывают исключения (требуется перезагрузка).
LanguageData.VME_StylesAmount: Максимум доступных стилей для идеолигии (по умолчанию 3, требуется перезагрузка)
LanguageData.VME_StylesAmountTooltip: Максимум доступных стилей для идеолигии. По умолчанию в моде он установлен на 5, против 3 в основной игре из-за большого числа добавленных новых (требуется перезагрузка).
LanguageData.VME_BuildingsAmountTooltip: Максимум доступных сооружений. Он включает в себя алтари, пиктограммы и т.п., но не включает сооружения, добавленные чертами.
